summary: Adidas is a German sportswear company, the biggest in Europe and second worldwide after Nike. Founded by Adolf Dassler in 1949, it began as a family business making athletic shoes, including spiked running shoes for athletes like Jesse Owens. The iconic three-stripe logo was bought from a Finnish company and has become a well-known symbol of the brand. title: Adidas
